segments.text: Do you know our major business ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know it is one of the leading industries in the petrochemical field .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a long-term plan for your career ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I hope I will be a manager in 5 years .
segments.speaker: S2
